snippet: So, big whoop, it turns out that some iPad designer at New York Magazine hit a home run in the bottom of the ninth to beat The New York Times Magazine. Winning isn't everything.
abstract: So, big whoop, it turns out that some iPad designer at New York Magazine hit a home run in the bottom of the ninth to beat The New York Times Magazine. Winning isn't everything.

headline.main: New York Times Magazine Plays New York Magazine in Softball, Everyone Gets Confused About Who's On Which Team
